name: vuex-ltm
description: Vuex - Long Term Memory: Async modular persistence for Vuex store.

scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:code && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:docs: typedoc --excludePrivate --excludeExternals --name "Vuex - Long Term Memory" --out docs src && copyfiles --all --up 1 "docs-misc/.circleci/config.yml" "docs"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test:versions:01: npm install vuex@3.0.0 vue@2.0.0 && cross-env "TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json" mocha --exit
scripts.test:versions:02: npm install vuex@3.0.1 vue@2.0.8 && cross-env "TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json" mocha --exit
scripts.test:versions:03: npm install vuex@3.1.3 vue@2.1.10 && cross-env "TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json" mocha --exit
scripts.test:versions:04: npm install vuex@3.2.0 vue@2.2.6 && cross-env "TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json" mocha --exit
scripts.test:versions:05: npm install vuex@3.3.0 vue@2.3.4 && cross-env "TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json" mocha --exit
scripts.test:versions:06: npm install vuex@3.4.0 vue@2.4.4 && cross-env "TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json" mocha --exit
scripts.test:versions:07: npm install vuex@3.5.1 vue@2.5.22 && cross-env "TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json" mocha --exit
scripts.test:versions:08: npm install vuex@3.6.2 vue@2.6.14 && cross-env "TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json" mocha --exit
scripts.test:versions:09: npm install vuex@4.0.0 vue@3.0.2 && cross-env "TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json" mocha --exit
scripts.test:versions:10: npm install vuex@4.0.2 vue@3.0.11 && cross-env "TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json" mocha --exit
scripts.test:versions:11: npm install vuex@4.0.2 vue@3.1.5 && cross-env "TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json" mocha --exit
scripts.test:versions:12: npm install vuex@4.0.2 vue@3.2.2 && cross-env "TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json" mocha --exit
scripts.test:versions:13: npm install vuex@4.1.0 vue@3.3.7 && cross-env "TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json" mocha --exit
